meanings.sent1: The doctor will etherify the patient before the surgery.
meanings.sent2: I need to etherify this fabric to make it fireproof.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally etherified my coffee instead of my water!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to etherify the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand seemed to etherify the ordinary hat into a rabbit.

meanings.sent2: The alchemist's goal was to etherify base metals into gold.
